title: Boku To Chourui Hyakka Mise
alternative_title: I and Bird Encyclopedia; ぼくと鳥類百科店; 我与鸟类百科店; 我與鳥百科店; Boku to chōrui hyakka-ten
status: I and Bird Encyclopedia; ぼくと鳥類百科店; 我与鸟类百科店; 我與鳥百科店; Boku to chōrui hyakka-ten
description:
Description :
        Shirosaki Haru, nine years old, is a 4th year elementary school student with no hopes or dreams for the future. One day, he visits the "Bird Encyclopedia Store", a specialty store that has a collection of birds from all over the world. What will an encounter with Kochikawa Enji, the store's manager full of hopes and dreams, bring about…!?
